mapper.insert: insert into bookMainCategory values(null, #{bmName}) on duplicate key update bmName=#{bmName}
insert ignore into bookSubCategory values(null, #{bmIdx}, #{bsName}) on duplicate key update bsName=#{bsName}
insert ignore into bookSubSubCategory values(null, #{bsIdx}, #{bssName}) on duplicate key update bssName=#{bssName}
insert ignore into bookDetailCategory values(null, #{bssIdx}, #{bsssName}) on duplicate key update bsssName=#{bsssName}
mapper.select: select bmIdx from bookMainCategory where bmName = #{bmName}
select bsIdx from bookSubCategory where bsName = #{bsName}
select bssIdx from bookSubSubCategory where bssName = #{bssName}
select bsssIdx from bookDetailCategory where bsssName=#{bsssName}
